title: Kadhal Oru Butterfly Lyrics OK OK Lyrics
stanzas:
Singers: Aalaap Raju, Hemachandran, Sunitha Sarathy
Song:  Kadhal oru butterfly
Lyrics : Na MuthuKumar
Movie: Oru Kal Oru Kannadi (Ok Ok)

Vantha thottuko thottuko
paniva pattuko pattuko
mudinja ottiko ottiko
kannaal othiko othiko
tholaal thothiko thothiko
thaniya kathiko kathiko

kadhal oru butterfly pola varum
vanthaal adhu kannamoochi aadi vidum

Siru pillai pole pinnale oodu
kaanamal ponal kannale thedu
yemaatra paarkum pala murai
endraalum maatum oru murai
engedhan pogum adhu varai
poda nee kadhal varum varai
(vantha thottuko ..)

kadhal oru butterfly pola varum
vanthaal adhu kannamoochi aadi vidum

Nee ennai paarkum kudhookalathil
naan unnai paarpen paravasathil
Mazhai pozhiyaatho,nenjam ninaiyaatho
mana kadalukulley,alai adikaatho

Manathai solla vantha nerathil
en nenjai kattinaai adai kamabathil
Kulir paarvai vanthu ennai anaikaatho
andha alaipinale uyir pizhaikaatho

Minsaaram mele kai vaithu vitten
aanalum kanne virumbi thaan thottaen
kadikaaram pole nam snegam enben
iru ullam serum neram ethirpaathu ninrenae

kadhal oru butterfly pola varum
vanthaal adhu kannamoochi aadi vidum

Thondailukul sikkuthe oru vaarthai
sollamal pookuthe en vaazhkai
Unnai thoda vanthen naan theenda villai
manjal kotai vittu kaal thaandavillai

paneerai thuvuthe oru paaravai
vinmeenai thuvuthe maru paarthai
intha idaiveligal en kuraiya villai
un kadai vizhiyil en karunai illai

Ketkaamal unnai,
naan kaadhal seithen
karum paarai,
meethu mazhaiyaaga peithen
penne un ullam ennendru solven
pala kallai veesi
paarthum udaiyatha kannaadi

kadhal oru butterfly pola varum
vanthaal athu kannamoochi aadi vidum

Siru pillai pole pinnale oodu
kaanamal ponal kannale thedu
yemaatra paarkum pala murai
endraalum maatum oru murai
engedhan pogum adhu varai
poda nee kadhal varum varai
(vantha thottuko ..)

vantha thottuko thottuko
paniva pattuko pattuko
mudinja ottiko ottiko

kannaal othiko othiko
tholaal thothiko thothiko
thaniya kathiko kathiko

vantha thottuko thottuko
paniva pattuko pattuko
mudinja ottiko ottiko
